videos.description: Nikola Jokic hits an open Austin Rivers with a no-look pass and he drains the 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jokic sends slick no-look pass for Rivers' 3) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic sends slick no-look pass for Rivers' 3

videos.description: LaMelo Ball gets a technical foul for forcefully removing the referee's hand after he catches him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo gets T'd up for moving ref's hand) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo gets T'd up for moving ref's hand
